content: the opening shut 2 sew head to body using inside loops only of last round of body 3 stuff arms lightly and sew to body 4 stuff muzzle lightly and sew to head using inside loops only of last round of muzzle 5 weave ends in ears and then sew ears to head i usually sew them between round 8 & 9 6 sew felt eyes to face alternatively embroider eyes to face 7 embroider eyebrows and mouth fig 3 4 © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved - 3 - lubi the bear fig 1 fig 2 fig 3 showing green loop of start of slip_stitch in last cc double_crochet last cc double_crochet fig 4 © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved - 4 -
